resources.string:
Lets Work together and Stop the Spread of Covid-19 

 Covid Guard Securely records information like Venue ID and duration of your stay at the venue

 Respecting your privacy the data will only be stored safely in your local storage

 All you need to do is to Turn On Bluetooth!!

Hello User! Permission Code will only generated to the Infected Users

 If you are infected and if you would like to help to stop the spread of the pandemic

 Upload your Local Storage data using this permission code!

 We appreciated your efforts! Hope you had a speedy recovery
I have Tested Positive for coronavirus

• We appreciate your efforts to stop the spread

 • Self Isolate Yourself 

 • Request Permission codes 

 • Authorize the permission codes 

 • Upload Data
